Development
========================
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 7
   :caption: NeuroDOT_Py Development
NeuroDOT_Py is maintained and under active development by the Brain Light Lab at Washington University in St. Louis. 

The NeuroDOT_Py development team welcomes any and all feedback from the community.

Different forms of feedback may fall under the categories such as issues, fixes, additions, and improvements to the toolbox. You may open an issue on the 
`NeuroDOT_Py GitHub page <https://github.com/WUSTL-ORL/NeuroDOT_py>`_ , or directly reach out to our development team via email (neurodot-support@wustl.edu) or via the `NeuroDOT feedback form <https://forms.gle/FkAXmd5JH2N5h7Uk9>`_ .

NeuroDOT_Py may also be discussed on the `NITRC forum <https://www.nitrc.org/forum/forum.php?forum_id=9802>`_ or the `OpenfNIRS forum <https://openfnirs.org/community/neurodot-forum/>`_ .
